title: Auto glass Fitter
text:
Fitment

· Complete all daily scheduled automotive glass fitments professionally and on time

· Perform fitments to a high standard with minimal reworks

· Ensure that the fitted vehicle and immediate surrounds are clean before leaving the site

· Ensure that the client is thoroughly advised of all important aspects of the fitment

· Ensure that Pre and post inspections on worksheet are comprehensively completed

· Ensure that a dry-fit is always performed before commencing with stripping for fitment

· Ensure that allocated fitment vehicle is properly maintained and presentably clean at all times.

Business Processes

· Double check all the documentation for the daily runs schedule

· Daily loading of glass onto vehicles according to invoices and fitment schedules.

· Complete daily checklists to ensure that vehicle is in running order and in good condition representative of the company standards and law.

· Complete daily checklists to ensure that all tools needed for fitment are in toolbox and confirm consumables needed for next fitment.

· Complete all RFC’s and hand over to fitment controller daily.

· Ensure that excess has been collected or proof of payment obtained before commencing with fitment

· When glass is collected from external supplier- direct to fitment - documentation to fitment controller on return
